import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' export const EditTodoForm = ({editBug, bugId, issueArray}) => { //TODO: Cancel edit const [value, setValue] = useState({issueArray /*issue: "", line: "", error: "", severity: "", priority: "", status: "", component: "", assignee: ""*/ }) const [isValid, setIsValid] = useState(false) let array = Object.entries(issues) console.log(issues) console.log(array) const mapId = () => { array.map(id => { array.id === id ? "Sucesso" : "falha" }) } mapId() useEffect(() => { const { issue, line, component, error, priority, severity, status, assignee } = value if(issue !=="" && line !=="" && component !=="" && error !=="" && priority !=="" && severity !=="" && status !=="" && assignee !==""){ setIsValid(true) }else{ setIsValid(false) } }, [value, isValid]) const handleClick = () =>{ let message let obj = Object.entries(value) const isFilled = obj.map(x=> x[1] === "" ? message = x[0] : "" ) if(!isValid) alert(` Please fill ${message} field to submit the issue`) } const handleChange = e =>{ const { name, value } = e.target setValue((prevVal) => ({ ...prevVal, [name]: value })) console.log({[name]:value}) } const handleSubmit = e =>{ e.preventDefault() const { id, issue, line, component, error, priority, severity, status, assignee} = value console.log(id) if(issue && line && component && error && priority && severity && status && assignee){ editBug(id, issue, line, component, error, priority, severity, status, assignee) console.log(id) /*setValue({ issue: "", line: "", error: "", severity: "", priority: "", status: "", component: "", assignee: "" })*/ setIsValid(()=>false) }else{ handleClick(e) return } } return (


) }
